attributes.action: Fire Patrick Vallance from his position as Chief Scientific Adviser to the govt.
attributes.additional_details: In order to replace Dr. Vallance with a more suitable adviser whose understanding of medical good practice conforms with international norms and is not distorted by ideological concepts like “herd immunity.”
attributes.background: Fire Patrick Vallance from his position as Chief Scientific Adviser to the govt. because of his disastrously wrongheaded advice on the Coronavirus pandemic that has unnecessarily endangered the lives of many thousands of people in th UK.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for people to be sacked.
